SELECT CR.NO ,CR.NAME ,CR.IMG , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM CHATTING_ROOM CR JOIN CHATTING_MEMBER_LIST CML ON CR.NO = CML.CHATTING_ROOM_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CML.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CR.NO = #{no}
